definition: Hue, city in central Vietnam and capital of Thua Thien province
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: She said that Vietnamese authorities are evaluating the events in Hue.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，越南当局正在评估顺化所发生的事件。

sentences.english: Oneof the most brutal massacres takes place in the city of hue.
sentences.chinese: 其中规模最大的屠杀发生在顺化市。

sentences.english: The 63-year-old clergyman is staying in his hometown of Hue.
sentences.chinese: 现年63岁的阮文黎神父目前住在他的家乡顺化。

pinyin: Mei2 gong1 he2 san1 jiao3 zhou1

definition: Mandalay, province and second city of Myanmar (Burma)
Kueijen township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Ho Chi Minh (1890-1969), former Vietnamese leader/see also 胡志明市[Hu2 Zhi4 ming2 Shi4]
Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam
